content.text:
# List of Waldorf Warriors head football coaches

The Waldorf Warriors football program is a college football team that represents Waldorf University in the Mid-States Football Association, a part of the National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics.  The team has had 5 head coaches since its first recorded football game in 2003. The current coach is Tyler Chapa who first took the position for the 2023 season.
